sentences.en: Greek & Roman mythology a priest or votary of Bacchus.
sentences.cn: (希腊 和 罗马神话)酒神巴克斯的牧师或信仰者.

sentences.en: Greek Mythology Roman Mythology A priest or votary of Bacchus.
sentences.cn: 酒神的牧师,酒神的信徒.

sentences.en: He was a votary of golf.
sentences.cn: 他是高尔夫球忠实信徒.

sentences.en: The organismic, "what you can do for your country" implies that government is the master or the deity, the citizen, the servant or the votary.
sentences.cn: 而后半句" 你能为你的国家做些什么"则意味着政府是主人，或者是神祗，公民只是仆人或者信徒。

sentences.en: The two votary lamps in front of the figure of Buddha are glittering slightly.
sentences.cn: 佛像前面点着两盏长明灯,闪着微微的淡光.

sentences.en: Then at last the votary of venus found words to thank the goddess.
sentences.cn: 这个时候,维纳斯的信徒才想起来向维纳斯女神感谢了一番.

trans.tran_en: ardently devoted to the services or worship of God, a deity, or a saint

trans.tran_cn: 信徒，追随者，（天主教）修士，修女
trans.tran_en: someone who regularly practises a particular religion
